all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.
James 1:5
Quote of the Day
"Many who would never consider active rebellion may still oppose the will and word of God by pursuing their own path."
D. Todd Christofferson | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
